Title: Active Measures
Writer: Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Debora Cahn, Anya Leta (staff writer)
Actors: Claire Danes, Elizabeth Marvel, Maury Sterling, Linus Roache
Plot: Carrie puts a plan in motion. Saul visits a source. Keane makes a desperate plea.
